name: ai-scraper-monorepo
description: Monorepo para Web Scraper con Backend (Node.js/Express) y Frontend (Next.js)

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend build skipped'
